DirectoryInput (autotransform.input.directory)

The implementation for the DirectoryInput.

class autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInput(params: autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInputParams)

Bases: autotransform.input.base.Input[autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInputParams]

An Input that lists all files recursively within a provided directory.

_files

A cached list of the files provided by the Input.

Type

List[str]

_params

Contains the directory to walk.

Type

DirectoryInputParams

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInput

Produces a DirectoryInput from the provided data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the DirectoryInput with the provided params.

Return type

DirectoryInput

get_items() → Sequence[autotransform.item.file.FileItem]

Gets a list of files recursively contained within the path in the DirectoryInput params.

Returns

The eligible files for transformation.

Return type

Sequence[FileItem]

static get_type() → autotransform.input.type.InputType

Used to map Input components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Input.

Return type

InputType

populate_files(path: pathlib.Path) → None

Populates the file cache for this input. Recursively called to walk all directories under the path.

Parameters

path (Path) – The path from which to populate files.

class autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInputParams

Bases: TypedDict

The param type for a DirectoryInput.
